name: Snake Plant
description: A hardy plant perfect for beginners. It purifies air and thrives with minimal care.

name: Peace Lily
description: Known for its elegant white blooms and air-purifying qualities. Great for indoor spaces.

name: Spider Plant
description: A fast-growing plant with arching leaves. Ideal for hanging baskets and beginners.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
description: Stylish and popular for home decor. Requires consistent care and proper lighting.

name: Aloe Vera
description: A succulent with healing properties. Great for sunny windowsills and low-maintenance care.

name: Rubber Plant
description: A bold plant with glossy leaves. It adds a modern touch to indoor spaces and grows tall over time.
